column1: Kata Robata////Decided to get some sushi at @katarobata for some dinner and as always did not let us down. We started with some of the duck wasabi soba noodles
column3: and three chicken skewers! Yea the place is a bit pricy but we'll worth it!! We also got some sushi but they were devoured on delivery . Great quality fish for a decent price point vs other high end sushi places. Remember to make a reservation!
